homeitems.homeSnippetBody: 100% of the material we process comes from State Forests and has FSC® certification (C131643).
We will deliver your timber to any place in Poland. Because it’s adequately protected, it arrives safe and always on time.
See how we use the knowledge we have gained over the last 60 years to produce timber. That’s why we are still a leader in the region.
We provide advice to all of our clients at every stage of the order. We suggest the appropriate type of material and select the adequate processing.

aboutHead: Behind every well-done work, there is a good craftsman.
aboutParagraph1: We are a promising construction company that performs its work with excellence.
aboutParagraph2: We are aware of the demands and complexity of our work, which is why we professionally present and advise you on the most suitable system work for you.
aboutParagraph3: During the period of operation, we marked a number of houses, commercial, school, tourist, production, business, sports and residential buildings in Slovenia and abroad.
aboutParagraph4: A lot of experience, quality services and the use of high-quality materials are a guarantee for long- lasting, effective and affordable solutions. We build and implement works that exceed customer expectations.
aboutFooter: We look forward to working with you.
contactFormHeader: We will love to hear from you.
contactFormTerms: By using this form, you agree to the storage and processing of your data by this website in accordance with data protection law.
errorTerms: Please accept our terms and conditions to proceed.
